name: SayaPrayer
0:
”Alexa, ask say a prayer to pray”
”Alexa, ask say a prayer for a daily prayer”
”Alexa, ask say a prayer pray”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say a prayer
des: Give the command: “Alexa, say a prayer” and hear a short inspirational Christian prayer just for you. Add this command to your morning or evening routine and start or end your day with God. Or ask for a prayer whenever you need encouragement to get through your day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
